headline: Demo 2012 student protests - mapped
text: Demo 2012 student protests - mapped East London Lines have put together a map of live tweets and images from the Demo 2012 protest march in central London. Around 10,000 students from across the UK are expected to join the protest and subsequent rally. You can send your own images or views from the march by emailing paul.owen@guardian.co.uk or Tweeting @GDNStudents   View NUS Demo 2012 in a larger map
